Category.name: adv
Category.desc-en: All about advertising: This includes sites offering banners and banner creation as well as sites delivering banners to be shown in webpages and advertising companies.

Category.name: aggressive
Category.desc-en: Sites with aggressive content such as racism and hate speech.

Category.name: alcohol
Category.desc-en: Sites of breweries, wineries and destilleries. This category also covers sites that explain how to make beer, wines and spirits.

Category.name: automobile/cars
Category.desc-en: All sites related to cars. Included are automobile companies and automotive suppliers.

Category.name: automobile/bikes
Category.desc-en: All sites related to motorcycles. Included are vendor sites, resellers, fan and hobby pages as well as and suppliers. Scooters included.

Category.name: automobile/boats
Category.desc-en: All sites related motorboats. Included are vendor sites, resellers, fan and hobby pages as well as and suppliers.

Category.name: automobile/planes
Category.desc-en: All sites related to planes ranging from small one and two seaters up to the large traffic planes, old and new, private, commercial and military. Vendors and supplier are included (airports are not). Helicopter sites are included as well.

Category.name: chat
Category.desc-en: Site for real-time chatting and instant messaging.

Category.name: costtraps
Category.desc-en: Sites that lure with free of charge services but then give then give you a costly subscription (written somewhere in tiny letters nearly unreadable).

Category.name: dating
Category.desc-en: Sites to contact people for love and living together. He seeks her, she seeks him and so on.

Category.name: downloads
Category.desc-en: This covers mostly filesharing, p2p and torrent sites. Other download sites (for software, wallpapers, ..) are included as well.

Category.name: drugs
Category.desc-en: Sites offering drugs or explain how to make drugs. Covers alcohol and tobacco as well as viagra and similar substances.

Category.name: dynamic
Category.desc-en: All domains where people login obtaining a dynamic IP address.

Category.name: education/schools
Category.desc-en: Home pages of schools, colleges and universities.

Category.name: finance/banking
Category.desc-en: Home page of banking companies are listed here. This is not restricted to online banking.

Category.name: finance/insurance
Category.desc-en: Sites of insurance companies, information about insurances and link collections concering this subject.

Category.name: finance/moneylending
Category.desc-en: Sites one can apply for loans and mortgages or can obtain information about this business.

Category.name: finance/other
Category.desc-en: Finance in general.

Category.name: finance/realestate
Category.desc-en: Sites about all types of real estate, buying and selling homes, finding apartments for rent.

Category.name: finance/trading
Category.desc-en: Sites about and related to stock exchange.

Category.name: fortunetelling
Category.desc-en: All sites about astrology, horoscopes, numerology, palm reading and so on; sites that offer services to fortell the future.

Category.name: forum
Category.desc-en: Discussion sites. Covers explicit forum sites and some blogs. Sites where people can discuss and share information in a non interactive/real-time way.

Category.name: gamble
Category.desc-en: Sites offering the possibility to win money. Poker, Casino, Bingo and other chance games as well as betting sites.

Category.name: government
Category.desc-en: Sites belonging to the government of a country, county or city.

Category.name: hacking
Category.desc-en: Sites with information and discussions about security weaknesses and how to exploit them. Sites offering exploits are listed as well as sites distributing programs that help to find security leaks.

Category.name: hobby/cooking
Category.desc-en: Sites concerning food and food preparation.

Category.name: hobby/games-misc
Category.desc-en: Sites related to games. This includes descriptions, news and general information about games. No gambling sites.

Category.name: hobby/games-online
Category.desc-en: Sites about online games. The games are for fun only (no gambling).

Category.name: hobby/gardening
Category.desc-en: Sites about gardening, growing plants, fighting bugs and everything related to gardening.

Category.name: hobby/pets
Category.desc-en: All topics concerning pets: description, breed, food, looks, fairs, favorite pet stories and so on.

Category.name: homestyle
Category.desc-en: Sites about everything need to create a cozy home (interior design and accessories).

Category.name: hospitals
Category.desc-en: Sites of hospitals and medical facilities.

Category.name: imagehosting
Category.desc-en: Sites specialized on hosting images, photo galleries and so on.

Category.name: isp
Category.desc-en: Home pages of Internet Service Providers. Sites of companies offering webspace only are now being added, too

Category.name: jobsearch
Category.desc-en: Portals for job offers and job seekers as well as the career and work-for-us pages of companies.

Category.name: library
Category.desc-en: Online libraries and sites where you can read e-books.

Category.name: military
Category.desc-en: Sites of military facilities or related to the armed forces.

Category.name: models
Category.desc-en: Model agency, model and supermodel fan pages and other model sites presenting model photos. No porn pictures.

Category.name: movies
Category.desc-en: Sites offering cinema programs, information about movies and actors. Sites for downloading video clips/movies (as long as it is legal) are included as well.

Category.name: music
Category.desc-en: Sites that offer the download of music, information about music groups or music in general.

Category.name: news
Category.desc-en: Sites presenting news. Homepages from newspapers, magazines and journals as well as some blogs.

Category.name: podcasts
Category.desc-en: Sites offering podcasts or podcast services.

Category.name: politics
Category.desc-en: Sites of political parties, political organisations and associations; sites with political discussions.

Category.name: porn
Category.desc-en: Sites about all kinds of sexual content ranging from bare bosoms to hardcore porn and sm.

Category.name: radiotv
Category.desc-en: Domains and urls of TV and radio stations.

Category.name: recreation/humor
Category.desc-en: Humorous pages, comic strips, funny stories, everything which makes people laugh.

Category.name: recreation/martialarts
Category.desc-en: Sites dedicated to martial arts such as: karate, kung fu, taek won do as well as fighting sports sites like ufc.

Category.name: recreation/restaurants
Category.desc-en: Sites of restaurants as well as restaurant descriptions and commentaries.

Category.name: recreation/sports
Category.desc-en: All about sports: sports teams, sport discussions as well as information about sports people and the various sports themselves.

Category.name: recreation/travel
Category.desc-en: Sites with information about foreign countries, travel companies, travel fares, accommodations and everything else that has to do with travel.

Category.name: recreation/wellness
Category.desc-en: Sites about treatments for feeling internally and externally healthy and beautiful again.

Category.name: redirector
Category.desc-en: Sites that actively help to bypass url filters by accepting urls via form and play a proxing and redirecting role.

Category.name: religion
Category.desc-en: Sites with religious content: all kind of churches, sects, religious interpretations, etc.

Category.name: remotecontrol
Category.desc-en: Sites offering the service to remotely access computers, especially (but not limited to going) through firewalls. This does not cover traditional VPN.

Category.name: ringtones
Category.desc-en: Sites that offer the download of ringtones or present other information about ringtones.

Category.name: science/astronomy
Category.desc-en: Sites of institutions as well as of amateurs about all topics of astronomy.

Category.name: science/chemistry
Category.desc-en: Sites of institutions as well as of amateurs about all topics of chemistry.

Category.name: searchengines
Category.desc-en: Collection of search engines and directory sites.

Category.name: sex/lingerie
Category.desc-en: Sites selling and presenting sexy lingerie.

Category.name: sex/education
Category.desc-en: Sites explaining the biological functions of the body concerning sexuality as well as sexual health.

Category.name: shopping
Category.desc-en: Sites offering online shopping and price comparisons.

Category.name: socialnet
Category.desc-en: Sites bringing people together (social networking) be it for friendship or for business.

Category.name: spyware
Category.desc-en: Sites that try to actively install software or lure the user in doing so in order to spy the surfing behaviour (or worse). The home calling sites where the collected information is sent, are listed too.

Category.name: tracker
Category.desc-en: Sites keeping an eye on where you surf and what you do in a passive manner. Covers web bugs, counters and other tracking mechanisms in web pages that do not interfere with the local computer yet collect information about the surfing person for later analysis.

Category.name: updatesites
Category.desc-en: List to allow necessary downloads from vendors.

Category.name: violence
Category.desc-en: Sites about killing and harming people. Covers anything about brutality and beastiality.

Category.name: warez
Category.desc-en: Collection of sites offering programs to break licence keys, licence keys themselves, cracked software and other copyrighted material.

Category.name: weapons
Category.desc-en: Sites offering all kinds of weapons or accessories for weapons: Firearms, knifes, swords, bows, etc. Armory shops are included as well as sites holding general information about arms (manufacturing, usage).

Category.name: webmail
Category.desc-en: Sites that offer web-based email services.

Category.name: webphone
Category.desc-en: Sites that enable user to phone via the Internet. Any site where users can voice-chat with each other.

Category.name: webradio
Category.desc-en: Sites that offer listening to music and radio live streams.

Category.name: webtv
Category.desc-en: Sites offering TV streams via Internet.
